title: (1) Andernach, Looking Downstream to Namedy, with the Watch Tower; (2) Andernach, Looking Downstream from the Landing-Stage by the Crane towards Hammerstein and Leutsdorf; (3) Leutsdorf; (4) The Crane at Andernach with Hammerstein in Right Distance
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
